thread.section_title: COQ Hotel Paris - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Dark secret
thread.title_full: Dark secret - Review of COQ Hotel Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Vanda C
title: Dark secret
text:
Off the beaten track, this bijou hotel offers all the home comforts in a small, dark and brooding package.
Our room was tiny, but fine for a night (or two at the most), but this was compensated by the informal communal reception area downstairs.
The staff were polite, and unobtrusive (but not overly friendly).
The decor is great, bed linen super crisp, and I loved the Nordic crockery. It was a little tired in places (a tiny tile missing from the shower, chipped plate and mug), but overall was good value. The complimentary cocktail in the evening is a nice touch, and breakfast was fab!
